duties_responsibilities.duty: Create a fine dining experience that ensures a positive and memorable guest dining experience.
Direct, plan, supervise, and monitor day-to-day operations to ensure flawless execution and guest experience.
Collaborate with Executive Chef and Chef de Cuisine to attract, select, and retain top talent, creating a positive work atmosphere.
Oversee accounting, budgets, and financial planning.
Handle guest concerns or complaints in a timely and guest-centric manner.
Train and develop staff, ensuring performance quality and memorable experiences for guests.
Maintain standard operating procedures for clarity, consistency, accountability, and safe operations.
Create work schedules to ensure adequate staffing and oversee that service meets/exceeds restaurant’s standards.
Maintain a safe, secure, and healthy facility environment by enforcing sanitation standards and procedures, complying with regulations.
Stay updated on emerging trends in the restaurant industry, review professional publications, and accomplish company goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in hospitality management and 8+ years in fine dining restaurant management work experience is preferred
